import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/CartIcon' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import './Header.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> LOGOUT
) : ( LOGIN )}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser, }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
